name: boxRunner (itch)
description:
This is "boxRunner".

Your task? Avoid hitting the boxes and the pigs while trying to get as far as possible.

Controls:
Press mouse to charge the power bar, let go to jump.

The game was made by Grzegorz Adamus and Bartłomiej Wiewióra as uni assignment.

At first we wanted to make this a coop endless runner to participate in weekly game jam 136 but due to time and technical issuses it ended up what it is now.
